videos.name: Toothbrush Chronicles: Super Hill
videos.info: A sequel to our original toothbrush video, this one had a much bigger scope and was a lot of fun to make. We used Unreal Engine 5 to create the environments, effects, and used MetaHumans for the characters.
videos.tools: Premiere Pro, After Effects, Photoshop, Unreal Engine 5

videos.name: House of Horrors
videos.info: A video using an Unreal Engine 5 game I was working on at the time.

videos.name: House of Pain - Jump Around
videos.info: A 90's themed music video using Unreal Engine 5. Had a ton of fun editing and shooting this one.
videos.tools: Premiere Pro, After Effects, Photoshop, Unreal Engine 5

videos.name: Two Highschoolers Fight Using Toothbrushes
videos.info: Seth and I's first video using After Effects. We experimented with many different effects.

videos.name: Hill-lucinations
videos.info: First video I shot using log. I wanted to experiement with the color grading and using 3D models in After Effects.

games.name: The Secret of Craig Hill Remake
games.info: An updated version of the original game with improved visuals and practices. I'm just using this project as a learning experience to see how much I can improve on the original with the skills I've learned since then.

games.name: The Secret of Craig Hill
games.info: A horror game I worked on in Unreal Engine 5 featuring my video production teacher. I handled all the programming, audio, and most of level design for this project.
